fact_list.fact_text: Width limit signs prohibit the entry of vehicles with width in excess of 2.3m.
Numerals on width limit signs may be altered to indicate different width restrictions.
Height limit signs prohibit the entry of vehicles with an overall height in excess of 4.5m.
Numerals on height limit signs may be altered to indicate different height restrictions.
Driving a vehicle with overall height exceeding 4.5m without police escort is an offence.
Weight limit signs prohibit the entry of vehicles with weight laden or unladen in excess of 10 tonnes.
Numerals on weight limit signs may be altered to indicate different weight restrictions.
Driving a vehicle with laden or unladen weight exceeding 10 tonnes without police escort is an offence.
